name: Li'l Scrapper
description:
Try to fix the ship while avoiding chaser bots. Collecting scraps will increase your score. Bumble bots won't hurt you, but they'll steal your valuable scrap!

Fix the three consoles (Electrical, Lifesupport and Engines) to enable the nav btn. When all the consoles are activated and the player walks over the nav button they win!

WASD to move.

Esc to Quit

Mouse Wheel to Zoom.
